knimeNode.name: Bugzilla Adapter (Offline)
knimeNode.shortDescription: Bugzilla Adapter, ImpressiveCode DePress Plugin Framework.

fullDescription.intro:
This node can be used to read data from Bugzilla entries file.
Bugzilla is a Web-based general-purpose bugtracker and testing tool
Please check workflow examples here.
Copyright (c) ImpressiveCode, DePress Project
fullDescription.option: Enter a valid file. When you press ENTER, the file is analyzed and the settings pre-set. You can also choose a previously read file from the drop-down list, or select a file from the "Browse..." dialog.

You can load your custom priority, resolution and status properties from previosly selected file. You are able to put any property, which has been found in your file into predefined groups available by clicking on the radio buttons. Properties without a group will be automatically put into unknown.

ports.outPort: Datatable just read from the jira entries file
